description: Mano Verde is an environmental consultancy, focused on minimizing ecological impacts across various sectors, including industry, tourism, and construction. The initiative emphasizes sustainable development, climate change adaptation, and circular economy practices. With a commitment to social and environmental responsibility, Mano Verde aims to educate and engage communities while providing innovative solutions for waste management and carbon footprint reduction. The organization also collaborates with academic institutions and local governments to enhance sustainability efforts.
name: Mano Verde
